name: 徐昕煒
objective:
本課程以 C 語言為核心，介紹現代程式語言的基本結構與邏輯，培養學生撰寫正確且有效程式的能力，並建立可自我延伸學習其他語言的基礎。課程涵蓋資料型態、控制流程、陣列、函數、指標、字串與檔案處理等主題，亦介紹基本的計算機軟硬體概念，並透過實例說明程式與生活應用的連結。課程同時導入生成式 AI 工具，協助學生提升學習效率與問題解決能力。
This course centers on the C programming language, introducing the fundamental structure and logic of modern programming. It aims to develop students’ ability to write correct and effective programs while laying a foundation for self-directed learning of other languages. Topics include data types, control structures, arrays, functions, pointers, strings, and file handling. Basic computer hardware/software concepts are also covered, along with practical examples that connect programming to everyday applications. Generative AI tools will be integrated to support learning and problem-solving.
schedule:
【期中考前】
Week 1: 課程簡介：電腦、網際網路與全球資訊網
Week 2: C 程式設計入門，包括 變數型態
Week 3: C 的算術運算，包括數字系統
Week 4: 判斷，包括：運算子、畫流程圖；C 格式化輸入 / 輸出
Week 5: 結構化程式的開發
Week 6: C 程式控制 Part 1
Week 7: C 程式控制 Part 2
Week 8: Midterm Test  
【期中考後】
Week 9: 陣列 (1) 
Week 10: 陣列 (2)
Week 11: 字元與字串
Week 12: 函式 (1)
Week 13: 函式 (2)
Week 14: 指標 (1)
Week 15: 指標 (2)
Week 16: 指標 (3)/ 檔案處理
Week 17: 上機考試
Week 18: Final Test
